title: Seeking information about placements..
content: I have recently joined PESU and I will be a first year student (soon enough hopefully), but i couldn't get the branch i wanted. I wanted CS but ended up with ECE. I wanted to know the exact placement procedure. How is the placement process conducted? How do they decide which branch gets to sit for a certain company? Does every branch get to sit for all the companies? If not, then how is the process different for let's say, ECE and CS departments?

comments.body: You can switch your stream after 1st year.You can also switch campuses. But it is based on your cgpa of first year. So be sure to study for the first two semesters.
Leave PES placements is a joke
